title: Supplier
text:
[[Product]] Supplier attributes: supplier_id|ID, name|Supplier Name, contact_person|Contact, email|Email, phone|Phone,
address|Address

title: PurchaseOrder
text:
[[Supplier]] [[Product]] PurchaseOrder attributes: po_id|ID, supplier_id|Supplier, po_date|Date, status|Status, total_amount|Total,
expected_delivery|Delivery Date

title: Invoice
text:
[[PurchaseOrder]] [[Supplier]] Invoice attributes: invoice_id|ID, po_id|PO, invoice_date|Date, due_date|Due, amount|Amount,
status|Status, payment_date|Payment Date

title: Employee
text:
[[Department]] Employee attributes: employee_id|ID, first_name|First, last_name|Last, email|Email, phone|Phone, hire_date|Hire Date,
department_id|Department

title: Department
text: [[Employee]] Department attributes: department_id|ID, name|Department, manager_id|Manager, location|Location

title: Project
text:
[[Department]] [[Employee]] Project attributes: project_id|ID, name|Project Name, start_date|Start, end_date|End, budget|Budget,
status|Status, manager_id|Manager

title: Task
text:
[[Project]] [[Employee]] Task attributes: task_id|ID, project_id|Project, title|Title, description|Description, due_date|Due,
status|Status, assignee_id|Assignee

title: TimeEntry
text: [[Task]] [[Employee]] TimeEntry attributes: entry_id|ID, task_id|Task, employee_id|Employee, date|Date, hours|Hours, notes|Notes

title: Expense
text:
[[Project]] [[Employee]] Expense attributes: expense_id|ID, project_id|Project, employee_id|Employee, date|Date, amount|Amount,
category|Category, description|Description, status|Status

title: Client
text:
[[Project]] Client attributes: client_id|ID, name|Client Name, industry|Industry, contact_person|Contact, email|Email, phone|Phone,
address|Address
